title: Ign Fuel Upload - Got "Core dumped" for some Models

content.raw:
I was using `ign fuel` to upload some models into the Staging server. I was using the following command:

```
ign fuel upload -m "<pathToModel>" --url "https://staging-fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/" --header 'private-token: <myAccessToken>' -v 4
```

For some, I got a `core dumped` error message. This was the output:

> \[Msg\] Parsing /home/german/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Tunnel Tile 3/2/model.config  
> terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::logic\_error'  
> what\(\): basic\_string::\_M\_construct null not valid  
> Aborted \(core dumped\)

The list of models I had issues with are:

* Tunnel Tile 3
* Tunnel Tile 4
* Tunnel Tile Blocker
* Constrained Tunnel Tile Short
* Constrained Tunnel Tile Tall
* Rough Tunnel Tile 4-way Intersection
* Rough Tunnel Tile 90-degree Turn
* Rough Tunnel Tile Straight
* Rough Tunnel Tile Ramp
* Rough Tunnel Tile Vertical Shaft

Just in case, I got these with the `ign fuel download` command.

```
ign fuel download --url "https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Tunnel Tile 3" -v 4
```

Perhaps there is something wrong in the `model.config` file of those particular models.

Hope this helps!
content.html:
I was using ign fuel to upload some models into the Staging server. I was using the following command:

ign fuel upload -m "<pathToModel>" --url "https://staging-fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/" --header 'private-token: <myAccessToken>' -v 4

For some, I got a core dumped error message. This was the output:

[Msg] Parsing /home/german/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Tunnel Tile 3/2/model.config
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::logic_error'
what(): basic_string::_M_construct null not valid
Aborted (core dumped)

The list of models I had issues with are:

  • Tunnel Tile 3
  • Tunnel Tile 4
  • Tunnel Tile Blocker
  • Constrained Tunnel Tile Short
  • Constrained Tunnel Tile Tall
  • Rough Tunnel Tile 4-way Intersection
  • Rough Tunnel Tile 90-degree Turn
  • Rough Tunnel Tile Straight
  • Rough Tunnel Tile Ramp
  • Rough Tunnel Tile Vertical Shaft

Just in case, I got these with the ign fuel download command.

ign fuel download --url "https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Tunnel Tile 3" -v 4

Perhaps there is something wrong in the model.config file of those particular models.

Hope this helps!
